about.title: About Me
about.aboutMe:
I'm Amit Raikwar, a full-stack developer driven by a passion for crafting exceptional digital experiences. My expertise lies in React, React Native, and Node.js, enabling me to seamlessly build robust and engaging applications from the ground up. 
 Beyond coding, I'm a lifelong learner, constantly exploring new technologies and ideas. I believe in a balanced life, embracing every opportunity for growth and discovery. 
 I wake up each day with a desire to contribute meaningful solutions and make a positive impact.
